content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Template Scanner API now supports Terraform HCLtemplates for CREM users March 31, 2025—Cloud Risk Exposure Management (CREM) users will now be able to scan Terraform HCL (.tf) templates with the latest API directly by scanning a .zip file of HCL templates. as opposed to converting the Terraform HCL (.tf) templates into HCL plan (.json) files before scanning. Additionally, you can now use the cloudPosture/scanTemplateArchive endpoint to POST a ZIP file containing your Terraform templates to be scanned. For more information, see the Template Scanner API documentation. Cloud Security → Cloud Risk Management © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Template Scanner API now supports Terraform HCLtemplates for CREM users
